# Commit Message Convention

We follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) for consistent and meaningful commit messages.

## ðŸ”– Types

| Type       | Description |
|-------------|-------------|
| **feat**    | A new feature |
| **fix**     | A bug fix |
| **docs**    | Documentation-only changes |
| **style**   | Code style changes that do not affect logic (e.g., formatting, spacing) |
| **refactor**| Code changes that neither fix a bug nor add a feature |
| **perf**    | Performance improvements |
| **test**    | Adding or correcting tests |
| **chore**   | Changes to build process or auxiliary tools and libraries |

---

## ðŸ’¡ Examples

```bash
feat: add spatial query endpoint for EHI data
feat(api): implement weighted EHI calculation
fix: resolve database connection timeout
docs: update API endpoint documentation
test: add unit tests for spatial utilities
